resources.string: What´s new in the latest version?
Set locks to access the app and allow touches with other visible windows
Keep track of logs produced by the execution of the app
Enable passcode or pattern lock to enable this option
Lock access from other apps to the files of the accounts in the app via the Android native file explorer.
Allow touches when the view is obscured by another visible window. Enable it to use light filtering apps.
Are you sure you want to enable this feature?
Use this feature at your own risk. A malicious application could try to spoof you into unknowingly performing some actions, using other views.
Manage location and behavior of the pictures uploaded automatically
Manage location and behavior of the videos uploaded automatically
Automatically upload pictures taken by camera
Uploads will be triggered when all selected options are fulfilled
Enable wifi only uploads to activate this option
Automatically upload videos recorded by camera
Automatic uploads are not available for users light
Enable logging and log files will show up here.
This is used to log problems.
Sync your contacts, calendars and tasks
Suggested app to browse the files on your device via the Android native file explorer

When activated, logs may impact performance and include sensitive information. However the logs are not subject to automatic submission to ownCloud servers. Sharing logs with others is sole user responsibility.
The patterns are not the same.
An error occurred while setting the pattern lock.
An error occurred while removing the pattern lock.
Pattern and passcode locks cannot be enabled at the same time, please disable pattern first.
Pattern and passcode locks cannot be enabled at the same time, please disable passcode first.
The pattern will not be asked for anymore.
The pattern will be requested every time the app is started.
A valid ACTION is needed in the intent passed to
"I want to invite you to use %1$s on your smartphone!\nDownload here: %2$s"
Authentication failed. Sign in again to regain access.
Your server version is lower than 10 so it is not supported, please upgrade your server to a newer version.
The access token has expired or become invalid. Sign in again to regain access.
There are no %1$s accounts on your device. Please set up an account first.
%1$s cannot upload a piece of text as a file.
Received data do not include any valid file.
%1$s is not allowed to read a received file.
File to upload was not found in its location. Please check whether the file exists.
An error occurred while copying the file to a temporary folder. Please try to send again.
Upload some content or sync with your devices!
You are not collaborating on other people\'s resources.
You don\'t have access to any space!
Files and folders you mark as available offline will show up here.
Files and folders you share by link will show up here.
No app found for file type
No app found for this action
There are no files in this folder.
There are no folders in this folder.
Upload something and it will show up here.
Tap on a file to display additional information.
Pick a document type to create:
File was renamed to %1$s during upload
Upload of %1$s could not be completed.
Upload failed, you need to log in again.
Insert a name for the new file.
File name must not be empty.
File name must not be longer than %d characters.
Picture uploads source path is not valid anymore.
Video uploads source path is not valid anymore.
Forbidden due to a firewall rule
Download of %1$s could not be completed
Download failed, you need to log in again.
Sync failed, you need to log in again.
Sync of %1$s could not be completed.
%1$d kept-in-sync files could not be sync\'ed
Contents of %1$d files could not be sync\'ed (%2$d conflicts)
The passcode will be requested every time the app is started.
The passcodes are not the same.
An error occurred while setting the passcode lock.
An error occurred while removing the passcode lock.
Register at least one biometric to use this feature.
Log in using your biometric credential.
Do you want to additionally activate biometric security?
Biometric unlocking is not available because the system could not provide it
File not in a valid account
Media file could not be read
Timed out while trying to play
Media file cannot be played with the stock media player
An account for the same user and server already exists on the device.
The entered user does not match the user of this account.
Unexpected state; please enter the server address again
Your authorization expired. Please, authorize again
The server does not support this authentication method
Your server is not returning a correct user ID. Please contact an administrator.
Account does not exist in the device yet
The file was set as available offline correctly
The file was unset as available offline correctly
Do you really want to remove %1$s?
Do you really want to remove %1$s and its contents?
Do you really want to remove the account %1$s?
This account has camera uploads attached, removing the account will disable the camera uploads. Do you really want to remove the account %1$s?
Do you really want to remove %1$s share?
A folder containing this file is available offline.
"Local copy could not be renamed; try a different name"
Remote file could not be checked
A new version was found in server. Downloading…
File name contains at least one invalid character
File name cannot be that long
"Unexpected problem; please select the file from a different app"
Connection is not secure, http traffic is not allowed.
The identity of the server could not be verified.
- The server certificate is not trusted.
- The server certificate valid dates are in the future.
- The URL does not match the hostname in the certificate
Do you want to trust this certificate anyway?
The certificate could not be saved.
This digest algorithm is not available on your phone.
There is a problem loading the certificate.
The certificate could not be shown.
Are you sure you want to disable this feature? The pending pictures will not be uploaded.
Are you sure you want to disable this feature? The pending videos will not be uploaded.

Please make sure the folder selected is where the camera you are using saves the pictures taken. Otherwise, the feature will not be able to detect your pictures. Keep in mind that pictures will be uploaded in at least 15 minutes after taking them. For a better performance, make sure in your device settings that %1$s is allowed to run in background.

Please make sure the folder selected is where the camera you are using saves the videos recorded. Otherwise, the feature will not be able to detect your videos. Keep in mind that videos will be uploaded in at least 15 minutes after recording them. For a better performance, make sure in your device settings that %1$s is allowed to run in background.
There is a conflict in file %1$s, tap to solve it.
Which files do you want to keep? If you select both versions, the local file will have a number added to its name.
An error occurred in the destination folder.
%1$s could not be copied to %2$s local folder.
It was not possible to retrieve the shares from the server
It was not possible to retrieve users and groups from the server
It was not possible to retrieve the capabilities from the server
Sorry, sharing is not enabled on your server. Please contact your administrator.
It was not possible to share this file or folder
It was not possible to unshare this file or folder
It was not possible to update this file or folder
No text received to copy to clipboard
Unexpected error while copying to clipboard
An error occurred while connecting to the server.
The server took too long to respond.
The server took too long to connect.
An error occurred in the network.
The file is no longer available on the server.
Secure connection is redirected through an unsecured route.
No app for sending logs found. Please install a mail app.
Nothing in here. You can add a folder!
You do not have permission to add content here!
Unable to move. Please check whether the file exists.
It is not possible to move a folder into a descendant.
The file exists already in the destination folder.
An error occurred while trying to move this file or folder.
Unable to copy. Please check whether the file exists.
It is not possible to copy a folder into a descendant.
The file exists already in the destination folder.
An error occurred while trying to copy this file or folder.
Synchronization of %1$s folder could not be completed
You can update your preferences in Settings
No data shared with users yet
To share with other users, your server needs to be at least version 8.2
Sorry, your server version does not allow sharing with users within clients. \nPlease contact your administrator
The file was not found in the local file system
Do you really want to remove these %s items?
Do you really want to remove the selected items and their contents?
Not enough space in the account
Streaming cannot be initialized because your server certificate is untrusted. File download will start automatically.
This video format is not supported.
This video file is no longer available in the server.
Streaming is not allowed via crossed redirections.
Video previewing is not supported in your Android version. File download will start automatically.
Device is not connected to a network.
Anyone with the link has access to the file/folder.
The public link will expire no later than %1$d days after it has been created.
Private link: Only people who have access to the file/folder can use it. Use it as a permanent link for yourself or to point others to files within shares.
Private link is not available for this file.
See the download file name and progress.
See the upload file name and progress.
See file conflicts when they occur.
You are %1$d clicks away to enable developer menus
If you enjoy using this app, could you take a moment to rate it? Your feedback is very important for us.
You can share privately or publicly
Connect to all your ownCloud servers
Play your videos without downloading them
No browser installed. Please install a browser in order to allow a secure login.
It was not possible to know if OAuth2 is supported.
It was not possible to know the server base URL.
Logs may contain sensitive information. Sharing logs with others is sole user responsibility

Found %1$s of data on your external storage. It will be moved to the safe storage on your device. Remaining files will be cleaned from your external storage after the migration to avoid duplicates and vulnerability.
Your app has been updated. This app update migrates your files to a more secure location on your device. This one-time data migration is required and can take up to a minute or more.
⚠️ Your free space is currently limited on your device. Some files may not be migrated, please check that all downloaded files keep downloaded after the process has been completed.
Migration completed successfully. Your files are now safer than ever.
Migrating your files. Please don’t turn your device off.
Please, select an option to lock the app:
Upload some content or sync with your devices!
Some bugs were fixed to improve experience in the app
A new design for Infinite Scale users in the spaces list, with a three-dot button on each space card that opens an options menu when clicked
Infinite Scale users with right permissions can now manage spaces (create, edit, disable, enable and delete) directly from the app
There are no apps that support this file type.
The requested file is not yet available, please try again later.
Please remove the account and log in again to get the spaces feature.
The log file %1$s has been downloaded correctly in Downloads folder.
The user doesn\'t have access to file
Please enter a password that meets the following criteria: \n
At least %1$d of the special characters: \"%2$s\"
Unfortunately, your password is commonly used. Please, pick a harder-to-guess password for your safety.
Remove automatically downloaded files that are not available offline, when the time since their last usage exceeds the selected time.\nSelected time: %1$s
The URL you provided uses HTTP rather than the encrypted HTTPS protocol. If you continue, your communication will not be encrypted.
All downloaded files that are not available offline will be cleaned up for the account %1$s
The URL must start with https:// or http:// so that it can be opened in the browser
Space name must not be empty
Space name must not be longer than 255 characters
Space quota must not be empty
Space quota must be greater than zero
Do you really want to disable the space: %1$s?
If you disable the selected space, it can no longer be accessed. Only Space managers will still have access. Note: No files will be deleted from the server.
Do you really want to enable the space: %1$s?
If you enable the selected space, it can be accessed again.
Do you really want to delete the space: %1$s?
If you delete the selected space, it can no longer be accessed and files will be deleted from the server.
Ask for help in our forum or contribute in our GitHub repo
